mapper.select: SELECT a.product_id as productId, a.stock as stock, a.price as price, a.image as image, a.product_name as productName, a.model as model, a.description as description, a.detail as detail FROM product a, tag b, brand c WHERE a.product_id = #{productId} AND a.brand_id = c.brand_id AND a.tag_id=b.tag_id AND a.tx_status=1

SELECT a.product_id as productId, a.tag_id as tagId, a.price as price, a.image as image, a.product_name as productName, b.category as category, a.description as description FROM product a, tag b WHERE a.tag_id = #{categoryId} AND b.tag_id = a.tag_id
